title: New Champ Suggestion
body: I would like to see League put out an ADC champ that has a passive constant weapon speed buff which scales off AD example: lvl1 10% WS Bonus + either 1% WS per 25 AD or u receive 25-50% of AD as WS and LVL2 15 or 20% base up each LVL by either 5-10 or 15. Just wanted to suggest this idea.

replies.body:
I think this idea needs some consideration.
Let's say we have a champion who can build to be pretty tanky, or a strong AD champ.
They have bad low attack speed though, and lets say bad armour or something.
Having them gain attack speed for their AD, or extra tankiness for building tankiness could create a champion which can be built multiple ways, but does not excel in their role unless they really build for that role.
